normalized_text:
RANJITH SANMUGAM  
Contact: +91 9025094665 | Email: ranjithranji9025@gmail.com | LinkedIn: Portfolio  

CAREER OBJECTIVE  
I am a passionate student of Computer Science and Engineering. With a strong foundation in programming languages and web development technologies, I am constantly exploring and honing my skills to become a proficient software engineer.

EDUCATION  
Mailam Engineering College, Villupuram (2021 - 2025)  
- Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science, Final Year  
- CGPA: 8.59 (Up to 6th Semester)  

J.M.J Matric.Hr.Sec.School, Marakkanam (2020 - 2021)  
- HSC - Percentage: 80.6%  

J.M.J Matric.Hr.Sec.School, Marakkanam (2018 - 2019)  
- SSLC - Percentage: 74.6%  

SKILLS  
- Programming Languages: Python, SQL (CRUD)  
- Web Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Git, GitHub, Bootstrap  
- Soft Skills: Designing (Figma), Leadership Quality, Communication  

PROJECTS  
1. Website Development  
   - Developed a responsive e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring a seamless user experience.  
   - Designed a responsive layout for multi-device compatibility.  
   - Optimized the website for fast load times and smooth performance.  
   - Designed user-friendly UI/UX elements for a visually appealing shopping experience.  

2. Analyse the COVID-19 Data  
   - Utilized SQL and Power BI to visualize COVID-19 vaccination and case data by state.  
   - Queried and analyzed COVID-19 patient data using SQL.  
   - Employed Power BI for visualizing vaccine distribution by state.  
   - Tracked and reported the number of positive and negative COVID-19 cases.  

INTERNSHIP  
Web Developer Intern at TechnoHacks Solutions Pvt. Ltd. (July 2024)  
- Enhanced skills in front-end technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.  
- Gained hands-on experience with responsive design and collaborative coding practices.  

AREA OF INTEREST  
- Software Developer  
- Web Developer  

CERTIFICATIONS AND PARTICIPATIONS  
- Fullstack Program Certificate [AICL, Chennai]  
- TCS iON Career Edge - Young Professional Certificate  
- Machine Learning Using Python Course Certification  
- Fullstack Program Certificate [AICL, Chennai]
